1.content:
"Miroku! You're back. How was your trip to India?" exclaimed Inuyasha, happy to see his colleague return.
"Astounding! I met a half-demon like yourself who uses the power of yoga to increase his flow of energy. He even showed me the ultimate posture for half-demons like yourself, and only on a full moon. So...interested?" said Miroku, already knowing the answer.
"Of course I am!" quickly replied Inuyasha.
"I thought you would be..." thought Miroku to himself.

That night...

"Well Inuyasha, as you obviously know, you lose your power on when there is no moon and thus, the energy of the full moon is absolutely vital. So you're going to have to strip down so you can absorb as much blutz waves...erm...energy of the moon as possible."
"What?! I'm not going totally nude! I-I'm gonna keep my loincloth on!" replied Inuyasha, annoyed at this.
"If it makes you feel better, I'll undress somewhat as well." replied Miroku.
"What?...Whatever. Anyways, now what do I do?" asked Inuyasha, prepping himself for the yoga he was about to do.
"Just go into the field and make absolutely sure you're in the full sight of the moon, then get into the yoga position I showed you earlier." explained Miroku.

Several hours later...

"Hmm, I don't know, you've done everything exactly like the half-demon told me..." said Miroku, unsure what was going on.

Miroku had gotten a hard-on the moment he saw Inuyasha start to turn into the muscle god he was now, but they were both in for a surprise when he saw Inuyasha's already enhanced cock harden and grow, and grow, and grow some more!
